name: John CHARNEY and Alice Charney, his wife, and John Charney, Jr., their son, and John Charney as parent and natural guardian of Brian Charney, a minor, Appellants, v. Elaine B. PANITZ, Appellee

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
MONTEMURO, J., who was sitting by designation, did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: John CHARNEY and Alice Charney, his wife, and John Char-ney, Jr., their son, and John Charney as parent and natural guardian of Brian Charney, a minor, Appellants, v. Elaine B. PANITZ, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., who was sitting by designation, did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Kenneth W. Behrend, Pittsburgh, for the Chameys.
Eugene Mattioni, Philadelphia and Alan S. Gold, Elkins Park, for Elaine Panitz.
casebody.head_matter:
669 A.2d 953
John CHARNEY and Alice Charney, his wife, and John Char-ney, Jr., their son, and John Charney as parent and natural guardian of Brian Charney, a minor, Appellants, v. Elaine B. PANITZ, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Sept. 19, 1995.
Decided Jan. 18, 1996.
Kenneth W. Behrend, Pittsburgh, for the Chameys.
Eugene Mattioni, Philadelphia and Alan S. Gold, Elkins Park, for Elaine Panitz.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
